title: Chico State - Main Giving Page
body:
Header

		


			Content

		





			 

		 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
            



Thank you for supporting Chico State! Every gift helps transform lives.
The Chico State Fund shapes today and tomorrow for students, faculty, staff, and the communities we serve. Gifts provide critical funds to scholarships, academic and student programs, facilities and technology, sustainability initiatives, and more. On the next page, you can designate your giving to support the University’s greatest need or any area you choose.




Learn more about ways to give by visiting www.csuchico.edu/giving.
 





 




 
 
 
 



 
 
 











 






Chico State
University Advancement
Report an accessibility issue


The California State University, Chico University Foundation is a nonprofit 501(c)(3) organization and your secure online gift is tax deductible. If you need assistance, please contact Gift Services at 530-898-4405 or giftservices@csuchico.edu.
